summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to attorney Jack Scarola, transmitting a subpoena seeking the settlement agreement from a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein. The prosecutor offers flexibility regarding confidentiality restrictions.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Recipient of a subpoena from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding a settlement agreement from a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the lawsuit from which the subpoenaed settlement agreement originates.

connections.description: Scarola is being subpoenaed for a settlement agreement related to a lawsuit against Epstein, indicating a prior legal connection.

events.title: Subpoena Issued for Epstein Settlement
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issues a subpoena to attorney Jack Scarola seeking the settlement agreement from a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively investigating Epstein-related matters as of March 2021.
A specific settlement agreement from a lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein was sought via subpoena.
Attorney Jack Scarola was identified as a holder of this settlement agreement.
The prosecutor acknowledged potential confidentiality restrictions associated with the document.
